translations: 舍客勒（以色列货币单位）（Shekel 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Each one of us will give you eleven hundred shekels of silver.
sentences.translation: 我们就每人给你一千一百舍客勒银子。

sentences.sentence: So David paid Araunah six hundred shekels of gold for the site.
sentences.translation: 于是大卫为那块地平了六百舍客勒金子给阿珥楠。

sentences.sentence: shekels of cassia-all according to the sancturary shekel-and a hin of olive oil.
sentences.translation: 桂皮五百舍客勒，都按着圣所的平，又取橄榄油一欣
